snippet.title: Pamali: Indonesian Folklore Horror #4: The Hungry Witch | Official Game Teaser
snippet.description:
Pamali - The Hungry Witch is coming soon on Steam!

Pamali is an Indonesian folklore horror game where choices are a crucial factor in defining the journey you’ll experience. See how myth and taboos of Indonesian society shape the horror itself.

In the fourth folklore, you'll experience Kirana's life, a pregnant mother who needs to protect her baby from the evil creature while avenging her mother's death. Kirana needs to find a way to kill the evil to survive from the attack and get through the dreadful night.

Get ready to explore the authentic Balinese setting. Help her to survive. The Hungry Witch is coming soon on Steam.

Follow us:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/990932/Pamali_Indonesian_Folklore_Horror__The_Hungry_Witch/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pamaligame/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pamaligame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/StoryTaleDev
